## Logger.fatalAndExit() method

fatalAndExit - 记录 fatal 日志并优雅退出

**Signature:**

```typescript
fatalAndExit(message: string, exitCode?: number, error?: Error): Promise<never>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | 错误信息 |
|  exitCode | number | _(Optional)_ 退出码,默认 1 |
|  error | Error | _(Optional)_ 错误对象(可选) |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;never&gt;

## Example

await logger.fatalAndExit('Database connection failed', 1, error);
